item.title: Introduction to Data Science - Homework 1 Solutions
item.description: This homework is designed to practice the skills we learned in up until Lecture 3: working with loops, conditions, functions, and the built-in Python data structures. Make sure to go through the lecture again in case you have any troubles. Note: You may not use higher-level library functions but should implement everything using functions, loops, and conditions. (see also Questions) Problem 1 - Largest Element Write a function that returns the largest element in a list.

item.title: Introduction to Data Science - Homework 1 Questions
item.description: This homework is designed to practice the skills we learned in up until Lecture 3: working with loops, conditions, functions, and the built-in Python data structures. Make sure to go through the lecture again in case you have any troubles. Note: You may not use higher-level library functions but should implement everything using functions, loops, and conditions. (see also Solutions) Problem 1 - Largest Element Write a function that returns the largest element in a list.
